title: Battery Atlanta Adventure
shortDescription: Explore the vibrant Battery Atlanta with this exciting scavenger hunt!
fullDescription: Discover the best spots in Battery Atlanta, including trendy restaurants, iconic landmarks, and exciting activities. Perfect for a fun-filled day out near Truist Park!

missions.title: The Coca-Cola Roxy
missions.shortDescription: Start your journey at the iconic Coca-Cola Roxy theater.
missions.hint: Look for the venue known for hosting concerts and events.

missions.title: Truist Park Plaza
missions.shortDescription: Visit the lively plaza outside Truist Park.
missions.hint: This spot is bustling with fans during Braves games.

missions.title: Terrapin Taproom
missions.shortDescription: Grab a refreshment at Terrapin Taproom.
missions.hint: Look for the bar known for its craft beer and tasty bites.

missions.title: The Battery Fountain
missions.shortDescription: Take a photo by the beautiful fountain in the heart of the Battery.
missions.hint: This fountain lights up beautifully at night.

missions.title: Punch Bowl Social
missions.shortDescription: End your hunt with some fun at Punch Bowl Social.
missions.hint: Look for the entertainment spot with bowling, arcade games, and great food.
